name: 1 6-oz. graham cracker crust
instructions: Drain can of mandarin oranges and chill oranges.
Reserve syrup â€“ add water to syrup to make 1 cup.  Boil syrup mixture.  Stir in package of jello.  With an electric mixer, blend a half a cup of the hot mixture in 8 oz. package of cream cheese.
Pour into piecrust and chill to set.
Put the other half of the jello over the pie and decorate with oranges.
